mobiles.name: sincap küçük
mobiles.long_description: Küçük bir sincap burada neþeyle fýndýk kemiriyor.
mobiles.description: He is a Small squirrel, and he is SOO cute!

mobiles.name: ufak sincap
mobiles.long_description: Ufak bir sincap burada, kayalarýn arasýnda kaybettiði fýndýðýný arýyor..
mobiles.description:
He is about 2 1/2 inches high, and weighs about 7 ounces.
He's got sharp teeth though....

mobiles.name: yýlan yeþil küçük
mobiles.long_description: Küçük yeþil bir yýlan burada, çimlerin arasýnda sürünüyor.
mobiles.description:
His scales remind you of green mirrors.  There is something
pretty about them though.

mobiles.name: kýrlangýç kuþ küçük
mobiles.long_description: Burada küçük bir kuþ var. Biraz yaklaþýnca, bir kýrlangýç olduðunu anlýyorsun.
mobiles.description: It's a swallow, what do you EXPECT to see???

mobiles.name: güney kýrlangýcý kýrlangýç küçük kuþ
mobiles.long_description: Bir Güney Kýrlangýcý burada....
mobiles.description: An African Swallow is here.... Carrying a cocanut..... :)

mobiles.name: rakun kahverengi siyah
mobiles.long_description: Kahverengi - siyah bir rakun burada, çalýlarý didik didik ediyor.
mobiles.description: He is very clean, must be from all those baths he gives his food...

mobiles.name: köstebek
mobiles.long_description: Bir köstebek burada.  Tabi ki çukur kazýyor..
mobiles.description: He is doing.. Well... Well, whatever ground-hogs DO, of course!

mobiles.name: tarla faresi küçük
mobiles.long_description: Bir tarla faresi burada. Gerçekten küçücük...
mobiles.description: He's small, and it is hard to see him clearly...

mobiles.name: kanatlý sincap
mobiles.long_description: Bir kanatlý sincap havada süzülüyor.
mobiles.description:
He's small, furry, and brown.  Makes you wish you could step on him-except
he's flying, and you're not.  We should fix this...

mobiles.name: gözleri parýldayan aþýk
mobiles.long_description: Gözleri parýldayan bir aþýk buradaki parkta gezintiye çýkmýþ.
mobiles.description:
He is tall, and very handsome.  You feel that the object of his affections
must be feeling very good.

mobiles.name: gözleri parýldayan aþýk
mobiles.long_description: Gözleri parýldayan bir aþýk neþeyle kendi kendine konuþup gülüyor.
mobiles.description:
She is young, beautiful, smart--- Kinda makes you jealous of the guy who
has nabbed her..

mobiles.name: bitkibilimcinin çýraðý genç
mobiles.long_description: Bitkibilimcinin çýraklarýndan biri burada.
mobiles.description: He is collecting herbs for use in his training, and his mentors work.

mobiles.name: su yýlaný
mobiles.long_description: Bir su yýlaný burada yüzüyor.
mobiles.description: He has green scales,  almost like his cousin in the Park.

mobiles.name: keskin diþli balýk küçük
mobiles.long_description: Küçük bir balýk burada özgürce yüzüyor.
mobiles.description: He has many small sharp pointy teeth in his mouth.

mobiles.name: orta boy balýk
mobiles.short_description: orta boy keskin diþli bir balýk
mobiles.long_description: Orta boy bir balýk burada özgürce yüzüyor.
mobiles.description: He has many medium sharp pointy teeth in his mouth.

mobiles.name: keskin diþli balýk büyük
mobiles.long_description: BÜYÜK, keskin diþli bir balýk burada özgürce yüzüyor.
mobiles.description: He has MANY, MANY,  sharp pointy teeth of the medium type....

mobiles.name: altýn balýðý küçük mutlu
mobiles.long_description: Mutlu bir altýn balýðý burada, mutlu olmakla meþgul..
mobiles.description:
Aw, the little fella must have been dumped here, all alone, to care for
himself.  You should help him...

mobiles.name: süs balýðý küçük mutlu
mobiles.long_description: Mutlu bir süs balýðý burada, öyle MUTLU ki sorma!
mobiles.description: He is almost as cute as the goldfish.  You should help him too.

mobiles.name: balýk körelmiþ diþli
mobiles.long_description: Körelmiþ diþli bir balýk burada, bulduðu otlarý çiðniyor.
mobiles.description:
This is getting silly, first small fish with pointy teeth, then medium ones,
and the LARGE ones,  AND NOW!  BLUNTED TEETHED ONES!
It's enough to make you sick....

mobiles.name: iðrenç umacý
mobiles.long_description: ÝÐRENÇ bir umacý burada, kendi çapýnda entrika planlarý yapýyor.
mobiles.description: He looks evil, and mean.  You wonder what he is planning to do down here..

mobiles.name: temizlikçi solucan
mobiles.long_description: BÜYÜK bir temizlikçi solucan burada!
mobiles.description: Now you know why these tunnels are so clean.

mobiles.name: vatandaþ adam erkek
mobiles.long_description: Güzel Gerighelm þehrinin vatandaþlarýndan biri burada, iþleriyle meþgul oluyor.
mobiles.description: The citizen of Gerighelm looks happy, and contented.

mobiles.name: vatandaþ kadýn
mobiles.long_description: Güzel Gerighelm þehrinin vatandaþlarýndan biri burada, alýþveriþ pazarlýðý yapýyor.
mobiles.description: She looks very worn from all this haggling.  But she is happy nonetheless.

mobiles.name: müzisyen ozan
mobiles.long_description: Bir müzisyen burada, güzel bir akþam yemeði hakkýnda þarký söylüyor.
mobiles.description:
His voice is clear and strong.  It makes you want to join in the song
(and buy him dinner...)

mobiles.name: kocakarý yaþlý
mobiles.long_description: Yaþlý bir kocakarý burada, çocuklara küfrediyor...
mobiles.description: She is wrinkled and bent.  She is also loud.....

mobiles.name: kel ihtiyar
mobiles.long_description: Kel bir ihtiyar burada, konuþup duruyor.
mobiles.description:
He is telling everyone in earshot how he defeated the red dragon and then
stayed to play with the kings wife.....

mobiles.name: çocuk küçük erkek
mobiles.long_description: Küçük bir erkek çocuðu burada bilyeleriyle oynuyor.
mobiles.description:
He has a nice bag of marbles.  Some are red, some are blue, some are green
with a curlycue.....

mobiles.name: çocuk küçük kýz
mobiles.long_description: Küçük bir kýz çocuðu burada oyuncak bebeðiyle konuþuyor.
mobiles.description: She is telling her doll The Facts Of Life....

mobiles.name: çaylak muhafýz
mobiles.long_description: Gerighelm'in çaylak muhafýzlarýndan biri burada, cesur ve kontrollü görünmeye çalýþýyor.
mobiles.description:
Hmm.  This is the new idea that the duke of Gerighelm has. It keeps youth
Off The Streets...

mobiles.name: genç kadýn
mobiles.long_description: Genç bir kadýn burada yoldan geçenlerle flört ediyor.
mobiles.description: She is about 16. And VERY attractive.

mobiles.name: muhafýz þehir muhafýzý gerighelm
mobiles.long_description: Bir Gerighelm þehir muhafýzý burada, masumlarý koruyor.
mobiles.description: He is large and strong.  You are glad that he's a Good Guy....

mobiles.name: muhafýz þehir muhafýzý gerighelm
mobiles.long_description: Bir Gerighelm þehir muhafýzý burada, masumlarý koruyor.
mobiles.description: He is large and strong.  You are glad that he's a Good Guy....

mobiles.name: muhafýz þehir muhafýzý gerighelm
mobiles.long_description: Bir Gerighelm þehir muhafýzý burada, masumlarý koruyor.
mobiles.description: He is large and strong.  You are glad that he's a Good Guy....

mobiles.name: ale-uzmaný ale uzmaný
mobiles.long_description: Ale-Uzmaný burada, denediði içkilerin ardýndan ayýlmaya çalýþýyor...
mobiles.description:
His job is to inspect the wine, cider, and beer of the town.
He does his job well.....

mobiles.name: koruyucu gerighelm
mobiles.long_description: Bir Gerighelm Koruyucusu burada, kendi halinde duruyor.
mobiles.description: He is worn and tired (WHOA! Army training must be HARD!).

mobiles.name: koruyucu gerighelm
mobiles.long_description: Bir Gerighelm Koruyucusu burada devriye geziyor.
mobiles.description: He is worn, and tired.  But he still stays at his job!

mobiles.name: saray muhafýzý
mobiles.long_description: Bir saray muhafýzý burada azametle yükseliyor.
mobiles.description: He looks happy with life-- As he is in the best position to enjoy it..

mobiles.name: saray muhafýzý
mobiles.long_description: Bir saray muhafýzý burada azametle yükseliyor.
mobiles.description: He looks happy with life-- As he is in the best position to enjoy it..

mobiles.name: aþçý
mobiles.long_description: Aþçý burada yeni yemek tarifleri üzerine düþüncelere dalmýþ.
mobiles.description: He looks like one of his creampuffs.  To bad he doesn't know how to diet...

mobiles.name: saray büyücüsü
mobiles.long_description: Saray büyücüsü burada büyülerini pratik ediyor.
mobiles.description: He is the standard wizard:  Old, decrepit, exceedingly powerful...

mobiles.name: saray rahibi
mobiles.long_description: Bu sarayýn rahibi burada, Tanrýsýna aþýrý bir adanmýþlýkla dua ediyor.
mobiles.description: He is the standard priest:  Old, fatherly looking, REAL powerful...

mobiles.name: baþ muhafýz
mobiles.long_description: Muhafýzlarýn baþý burada--TANRIM gerçekten DEV GÝBÝ!
mobiles.description: He's HUGE!!!!

mobiles.name: saray bahçývaný
mobiles.long_description: Saray bahçývaný burada soðuk kanlýlýkla yabani otlarý yoluyor.
mobiles.description: He is grabbing weeds like there is no tomorrow...

mobiles.name: özel koruma
mobiles.long_description: Bir özel koruma burada Dük'ü koruyor.
mobiles.description: He looks like he will give his life for his Duke.

mobiles.name: özel koruma
mobiles.long_description: Bir özel koruma burada Dük'ünü koruyor.
mobiles.description: He looks like he will give his life for his Duke.

mobiles.name: dük gerighelm
mobiles.long_description: Gerighelm Dükü burada, görkemli topraklarýný seyre dalmýþ.
mobiles.description: He looks worn, but happy.

mobiles.name: düþes gerighelm
mobiles.long_description: Gerighelm Düþesi burada, gece balolarý ve benzeri þeyleri düþünüyor.
mobiles.description: She is a VERY social person...

mobiles.name: hizmetçi
mobiles.long_description: Dükün hizmetçilerinden biri burada, görevinin hakkýný vermeye çalýþýyor.
mobiles.description: He looks at you and says, what are you doing here?

mobiles.name: yankesici
mobiles.long_description: Bir yankesici burada, gizlenmeye çalýþýyor.
mobiles.description: Well, COUNT your money!

mobiles.name: fýrýncý
mobiles.long_description: Gerighelm'in fýrýncýsý burada, bir þeyler satmakla meþgul.
mobiles.description: He looks like a friendly old man who likes to bake.

mobiles.name: demirci vendy
mobiles.long_description: Demirci Vendy burada, bir þeyler satarken örsüne vurmayý da ihmal etmiyor.
mobiles.description:
The way she is pounding her anvil makes you want to be on his good side.
The main reason, is that I doubt the anvil can take much more of her pounding.

mobiles.name: büyücü
mobiles.long_description: Büyücü burada, bir þeyler satmakla meþgul.
mobiles.description: He is a powerful old coot....

mobiles.name: rehin dükkaný sahibi
mobiles.long_description: Rehin dükkaný sahibi bir þeyler alýp satýyor.
mobiles.description: He looks almost like the pawn...

mobiles.name: tüccar
mobiles.long_description: Tüccar burada bazý mallarýný satýyor.
mobiles.description: HE'S A MERCHANT!

mobiles.name: bitki bilimci bitkibilimci
mobiles.long_description: Bitkibilimci burada þifalý bitkiler satýyor.
mobiles.description: She looks like she is happy with her lot in life.

mobiles.name: hayvan satýcýsý
mobiles.long_description: Hayvan satýcýsý burada evcil hayvanlarý pazarlamakla meþgul.
mobiles.description: He is covered in his stock..

mobiles.name: büyücü cadý kocakarý
mobiles.long_description: Yaþlý Cadý burada, bir þeyler satmakla meþgul.
mobiles.description: She is old, and ugly- very good witch material...

mobiles.name: atmaca
mobiles.long_description: Sahibine oldukça sadýk görünen bir atmaca burada.
mobiles.description: The hawk glares at you.

mobiles.name: ölüm
mobiles.long_description: Ölüm burada seni bekliyor.
mobiles.description:
It is strong, impertubable looking creature. It notice that you look at its,
and it says: 'Have a nice day'. Hm?... Death is your only way, probably...

objects.name: kuvvetlendirici bitkiler kýrmýzý demet
objects.description: Bir demet kuvvetlendirici bitki burada yetiþmiþ.

objects.name: þifalý bitkiler yeþil demet
objects.description: Bir demet þifalý bitki burada yetiþmiþ.

objects.name: tuhaf bitkiler yeþil demet
objects.description: Bir tuhaf bitki kümesi burada yetiþmiþ.

objects.name: ceset süs balýðý cesedi
objects.description: Bir süs balýðý cesedi burada. Tek yaptýðý ölü gibi uzanmak.

objects.name: ceset altýn balýðý cesedi
objects.description: bir altýn balýðý cesedi burada.  Öleli epey bir süre olmuþ..

extra_descriptions.description:
On the side it has words that say:

                                Lute of power.

On the side it says:
                                Harp of safety.

On the side is says:

                       Angel Enterprises Ltd.

objects.name: oyuncak bebek
objects.description: Bir oyuncak bebek burada yerde duruyor.

objects.name: yelek çaylak muhafýz
objects.description: Çaylak muhafýzlardan birinin yeleði burada unutulmuþ.

extra_descriptions.description:
On the side it says:
                                Angel Enterprises Ltd.

objects.name: kalkan çaylak muhafýz
objects.description: Bir çaylak muhafýz kalkaný burada unutulmuþ.

extra_descriptions.description:
On the side it says:
                                Angel Enterprises Ltd.

objects.name: fener çaylak muhafýz
objects.description: Bir çaylak muhafýz feneri burada tozun içinde duruyor.

objects.name: cop çaylak muhafýz
objects.description: Bir çaylak muhafýz copu burada tozlanmakla meþgul.

objects.name: keskin týrnak
objects.description: Keskin bir týrnak burada tozun içinde duruyor.

objects.name: gerighelm muhafýz yüzüðü
objects.description: Bir Gerighelm muhafýz yüzüðü burada, unutulmuþ bir halde duruyor.

objects.name: kalkan muhafýz gerighelm
objects.description: Bir Gerighelm kalkaný burada, gitgide tozun derinliklerine gömülüyor.

objects.name: kýlýç muhafýz gerighelm
objects.description: Kenarýna Gerighelm'in renkleri iþlenmiþ bir kýlýç burada.

objects.name: parka saray muhafýzý parkasý
objects.description: Parýldayan bir parka! Ve hatta výzýldayan!!

objects.name: kýlýç saray muhafýzý kýlýcý
objects.description: Kenarýna pek çok rün iþlenmiþ bir kýlýç burada.

extra_descriptions.description:
The runes say:

                                Made in HEAVEN.....

What does that mean?

objects.name: kutsal kelam
objects.description: Kutsal bir kelam burada, havada asýlý duruyor.

objects.name: garip bitkiler yeþil küme
objects.description: Yeþil renkli garip bir bitki kümesi burada yetiþmiþ.

objects.name: sihirli þiþe havayla dolu
objects.description: Bir þiþe burada tozlarýn içine gömülmüþ.

extra_descriptions.description:
It has written on the side:

Garunteed to provide fresh breathing air underwater, till it doesn't...

objects.name: mermer yeþil
objects.description: Yeþil bir mermer burada, tamamen kimsesiz býrakýlmýþ...

objects.name: mermer mavi
objects.description: Bir mermer burada. Hoþ bir mavisi var.

objects.name: kolluklar koruyucunun kolluðu
objects.description: Bir çift kolluk burada tozlanmakla meþgul.

objects.name: bacaklýklar koruyucunun bacaklýðý
objects.description: Bir çift bacaklýk burada tozlanmakla meþgul.

objects.name: kalkan koruyucunun kalkaný
objects.description: Üzerine Gerighelm'in hanedan armasý iþlenmiþ bir kalkan burada.

objects.name: yelek koruyucunun yeleði
objects.description: Altýn ve gümüþten bir yelek yolun bir kenarýnda duruyor.

objects.name: pelerin koruyucunun pelerini
objects.description: Bir aðacýn dalýnda pelerin asýlý duruyor.

objects.name: parka koruyucunun parkasý
objects.description: Altýn ve gümüþten bir kumaþ öbeði burada yerde duruyor.

objects.name: eldivenler koruyucunun eldivenleri
objects.description: Bir çift eldiven yolun kenarýnda duruyor.

objects.name: týrpan
objects.description: Çok tehlikeli görünen kötücül bir týrpan burada.

rooms.name: Park Giriþi
rooms.description:
This is the entrance to a small park. You see that it is full of animals,
birds, and reptiles.  There are also people here, strolling around in the
romantic setting.

rooms.name: Parkýn içi
rooms.description:
You are standing inside what looks like a park--probably because it is
one...

exits.description: You see the entrance to the park.
You see the park continue on.
You see the park continue on.

rooms.name: Park
rooms.description:
You are in the park, it is green, and bright, but for some reason,
someone placed a wall to the north, east, and south....

rooms.name: Park
rooms.description:
You are in the park.  The breeze flows around you like a current of
refreshing water.

rooms.name: Park
rooms.description:
You are in the Park. You think that it is cool and refreshing to be here,
and that you should really come here more often.

rooms.name: Park
rooms.description: You are in the Park.  This is a really nice place to be.

rooms.name: Park
rooms.description:
You are in the Park.  The cool breezes bring on memorys of when you were
a small child.

rooms.name: Park
rooms.description:
You are in the Park.  here, at the edge of the park, you find several
benches.  However, they are all occupied by the people who got here first.
'Da*n' you think, as you see them all so full of grins.

rooms.name: Park
rooms.description: You are in the Park.  You feel intoxicated by the night breeze.

rooms.name: Park
rooms.description: You are in the Park.  Gods, this is beautiful!

rooms.name: Park
rooms.description:
You are in the Park.  You think 'This is THE most BEAUTIFUL place I've
ever been to!'.

rooms.name: Parkýn içindeki patika
rooms.description:
You are in the Park.  You are on a small worn trail to a building to the
east.

rooms.name: Parkýn içindeki patika
rooms.description:
You are in the Park.  The trail that you are on leads east toward that
building that your see there.

rooms.name: Parkýn içindeki patikada yol ayrýmý
rooms.description: The trail goes east, and south here. There is a building to the east.

rooms.name: Bekçinin Evi
rooms.description:
You are in the home of the Caretaker of this Park.  You see shiny spades,
hoes, and watering-cans that the Caretaker must like a lot.

rooms.name: Patika
rooms.description:
You are along a trail in the park that is going south at the moment.
You wonder what could be at the end of it...

rooms.name: Patika
rooms.description:
You are along the trail in the park that is going somewhere.... You
wonder where....

rooms.name: Patikanýn sonu
rooms.description:
Ah, at last!  The end of the trail!  But um, there really isn't much to
see...  I'm sorry.

rooms.name: Park
rooms.description:
You are in the Park.  You feel that it is so peaceful here that you
want to drop your gear and just rest a moment.

rooms.name: Parkýn içindeki Bahçenin Giriþi
rooms.description:
You are in a large garden now.  It has violets, and other flowers that you
can't begin to name. (sorry that you slept through that class aren't you?).

rooms.name: Bahçe
rooms.description: You are inside the garden now, and you see even MORE flowers!

exits.description: You see the Entrance to the garden.

rooms.name: Bahçe
rooms.description: You are in the garden, there are many lovers here who are (Ahem) 'necking'.

rooms.name: Bahçe
rooms.description: You are in the garden.  This section seems to be devoted to roses.

rooms.name: Bahçe
rooms.description: You are in the section of the garden that is devoted to lilacs.

rooms.name: Kanalizasyonun Ýçi
rooms.description:
You are inside the dark, dank sewers of Gerighelm.  There is a faint
scent of mud in the air.  To the north, there is a wall.....

exits.description: You see the entrance to the sewers.

rooms.name: Kanalizasyonun Ýçi
rooms.description: You are in the old sewer system of Gerighelm.  It is dark and hard to see.

rooms.name: Kanalizasyon
rooms.description: Hmm, another dead end.

rooms.name: Kanalizasyon
rooms.description: You are in a tunnel that leads north-south.  The walls here are moist.

rooms.name: Kanalizasyon
rooms.description: You are in a tunnel that leads north-south.  The walls are moist here.

rooms.name: Kanalizasyon
rooms.description:
You are at one end of a tunnel that leads north-south.  I wonder where
it goes.  Oh well, you can keep wondering, because there is a magic sign
that says 'UNDER CONSTRUCTION' to the west......

rooms.name: Kanalizasyon
rooms.description: You are in one of the twisting tunnels that abound in these sewers.

exits.description: You see some VERY clean sewers.

rooms.name: Kanalizasyon
rooms.description: You are in one of the twisting tunnels in this maze of messy water.

rooms.name: Kanalizasyon
rooms.description:
You are in the sewers.  Not a very nice area to be.
Especially because it doesn't exactly smell nice.
( You just realized it wasn't your breath...)

rooms.name: Kanalizasyon
rooms.description:
The tunnel continues on, to the east, and west.  There is a tunnel to the
south.

rooms.name: Tünel
rooms.description:
You are going down a tunnel that runs north-south.  To
the south there is a wet scent.

rooms.name: Tünel
rooms.description:
You are going down a tunnel that leads north-south.  There is some water
to the south.

rooms.name: Islak tünel
rooms.description:
There is some water here, it is up to your waist.  It is calm enough
to swim or wade though.

rooms.name: Islak tünel
rooms.description: The water gets deeper here, it is up to your chin.

exits.description: You see the end of the tunnel.

rooms.name: Islak tünelin sonu
rooms.description:
The tunnel ends here, with all that water in the tunnel pouring out.
The water here is rough, it is all you can do to keep your head afloat.
To the east and west, there a walls in the way of your movement.

rooms.name: Kanalizasyon
rooms.description: You are in the sewers.  There is the familiar dank smell to everything...

rooms.name: Kanalizasyon
rooms.description: You are in the sewers, to the east, the tunnel ends.  So it seems.

rooms.name: Kanalizasyon
rooms.description:
You are at the end of one of the countless tunnels in these sewers.
To the east, there is a grate that seems to have a force field in between
the holes in it.

rooms.name: Nehir suyunun altýnda
rooms.description:
You are swimming underwater in the river.  It looks so different from
down here.

exits.description: You see the grate to the sewers.

rooms.name: Su altý
rooms.description:
You are underwater in the river.  There seems to be a force field
to the south....

rooms.name: Su altý
rooms.description: You are underwater in the river.

rooms.name: Su altý
rooms.description: You are underwater in the river.

rooms.name: Su altý
rooms.description:
You are underwater in the river.  The water shallows out to the north.
To the west there is a ledge that is just above the water, some of it
is underwater.  As you look closer to the north, you see that there is a
force field blocking your passage.

exits.description: You see the half flooded sewers.

rooms.name: Kanalizasyonun su baskýnýna uðramýþ bir bölümü
rooms.description:
You are up to your waist in river water.  To the west there are some VERY
clean sewers...

rooms.name: Kanalizasyonun çok temiz bir bölümü
rooms.description:
You are standing at the start of a section of sewers that are VERY
clean...  There is a sign here.

extra_descriptions.description:
The sign reads:

                             WARNING    WARNING
                         TESTING GROUNDS FOR MAGIC WORMS.
                             PROCEED AT OWN RISK.

Gerighelm Sewer Service.

rooms.name: Kanalizasyonun çok temiz bir bölümü
rooms.description:
You are in some VERY clean sewers.  You have been wondering what that
sign meant by 'MAGIC WORMS'.......

rooms.name: Kanalizasyonun çok temiz bir bölümü
rooms.description: You are in the VERY clean sewers.

rooms.name: Kanalizasyonun çok temiz bir bölümü
rooms.description: You are in the VERY clean sewers.

rooms.name: Kanalizasyonun çok temiz bir bölümü
rooms.description: You are in the VERY clean sewers.

rooms.name: Kanalizasyonun çok temiz bir bölümü
rooms.description: You are in some EXTREEMLY clean sewers!  There is a sign here.

extra_descriptions.description:
The sign reads:


                                WARNING    WARNING
                        TESTING GROUND FOR MAGIC WORMS.
                                PROCEED AT OWN RISK.

Gerighelm Sewer Service.

rooms.name: Kanalizasyonun çok temiz bölümündeki eski kütüphane
rooms.description:
You are in the VERY clean sewers.  There are some benches here, as well
as some old books that are aged bye time..  You are afraid to touch them,
unless they may crumble to dust with your touch.  One of the books is open.

extra_descriptions.description:
The page reads:

went off to find him.  The next day, the archangel Zarchon came to earth,
and asked why the people were suffering.  He was told by the minstrel,
'There are no Heros in this land, and no adventurers' he said, 'That is why
I am unhappy.'.

He asked a passing child, 'Why are you suffering?'.
The child replyed, 'I have no "role-models"  I am told.  In the old days,
there were many brave warriors, priests, wizards, and rouges.  BUt now any-
more...'.

So Zarchon took the case to the God Trollz, and his aides, Tass, and Garth.
And Trollz said 'There shall be adventurers again. I command it.'

And it was done, and there were such greats as uidsgfjkjskfauwehfjk

The rest is garbled by time.

rooms.name: Karanlýk Ormandaki bir kesiþme
rooms.description: You are at a junction in the Dark Forest.

rooms.name: Toprak patika
rooms.description:
You are on a dirt path that leads to a town. (you can tell this because
a passerby told you.), the path continues north and south.

rooms.name: Toprak patika
rooms.description: You are on a dirt path.

rooms.name: Toprak patika
rooms.description: You are on the dirt path.

rooms.name: Toprak patika
rooms.description: You are on the dirt path.

rooms.name: Toprak patika
rooms.description: You are on the dirt path.

rooms.name: Toprak patika
rooms.description: You are on the dirt path.  Up ahead, you see a LARGE city.

exits.description: You see the gate of Gerighelm.

rooms.name: Gerighelm Kapýlarý
rooms.description:
You are standing inside the Gate of Gerighelm.  There is only one,
because the town is surrounded by mountains.  Of course, there is a lot
of traffic here.
     There is a small (Glowing) (Humming) tablet.

exits.description: You see the West-Street of Gerighelm.

rooms.name: Gerighelm'in Batý Yakasý Sokaðý
rooms.description:
This is the western most street of Gerighelm.  To the east, there is
a street with a sign proclaiming:  Peter Ave.

exits.description: You see the Gate of Gerighelm.

rooms.name: Peter Bulvarý
rooms.description:
You are on Peter Ave.  To the south, you can see the park, but the entrance
to the park is still to the east.

rooms.name: Peter Bulvarý
rooms.description: You are on Peter Ave. The the south, you see the entrance to the park.

rooms.name: Peter Bulvarý
rooms.description: You are on Peter ave. The the west, you see the entrance to the park.

rooms.name: Peter Bulvarý
rooms.description:
You are on Peter Ave.  To the west, you can see the park, but it's entrance
is not in sight.

rooms.name: Ticaret Yolu
rooms.description:
You are on the Merchant Way.  There are vendors selling everything that you
could possibly need.

exits.description: You see the shop with lots of food..

rooms.name: Ýçinde çok miktarda yiyecek bulunan dükkan
rooms.description:
This shop has lots of food in it. Apples, pies, carrots, you name it.
There is a sign here.

extra_descriptions.description:
The sign reads:

      To buy an item, type: BUY <itemname>
      To see what is in our fine stock, type: LIST
      To see if we wish to purchase something from you, type: VALUE <item>
      If we are interested in the item, you can sell it to use with SELL <item>

rooms.name: Ticaret Yolu
rooms.description: You are on the Merchant Way.  To the south, there is a weapon shop.

exits.description: You see the end of merchant way.

rooms.name: Silah dükkaný
rooms.description:
You are in the weapon shop. There are many fine weapons here, but all of
them are safe and out of your reach.  There is a sign here.

extra_descriptions.description:
The sign reads:


To see what we have for sale, type: LIST
To see if we want to buy something from you, type: VALUE <item>
To buy an item type: BUY <item>
To sell an item, type: SELL <item>

rooms.name: Ticaret Yolu'nun Sonu
rooms.description:
You are at the end of merchant way, yet there is still another store
south of here.

rooms.name: Bitki Dükkaný
rooms.description:
You are inside the Herbalist Shop.  There are many herbs here- Lord knows
WHAT some of them do... There is a sign here too, on the table.

exits.description: You see the end of merchant way.

extra_descriptions.description:
The sign reads:

To see what we have for sale, type: LIST
To buy something, type: BUY <item>
To value something, type: VALUE <item>
To sell something, type: SELL <item>

rooms.name: Ticaret Yolu
rooms.description: You are on merchant way. To the south, there is another shop.

rooms.name: Büyü Dükkaný
rooms.description:
You are inside the magic shop.  There are many many many magical things
of unknown nature.  There is a sign here.

extra_descriptions.description:
the sign reads:

to see what we have for sale, type: LIST
To see what we want to buy from you, type: VALUE <item>
To sell an item, type: SELL <item>
To buy an item, type: BUY <item>

rooms.name: Ticaret Yolu
rooms.description:
You are on the merchant way.  To the south, there is the local branch
of the Pawn Shop.  And to the west, Merchant ave. ends.

rooms.name: Rehin Dükkaný
rooms.description:
You are in the Pawn shop.  Unfourtuatly, there is no pawn here,
just a hired merchant.

rooms.name: Batý Yakasý Sokaðý
rooms.description: You are on West-Street.  To the east, the Merchant Way begins.

rooms.name: Batý Yakasý Sokaðý
rooms.description: You are on the West-Street.  To the north, you approach the North Gate.

rooms.name: Batý Yakasý Sokaðý
rooms.description:
You are on the West-Street.  To the south, Merchant way begins. As well as
to the north.

rooms.name: Batý Yakasý Sokaðý
rooms.description:
You are on West-Street. To the west, Mable Road begins, and to the east
Merchant way travels.

rooms.name: Mable Yolu
rooms.description:
You are on Mable road.  It was called this after the late Kings wife.
To the north, the Palace of the Duke grows to the horizon.

rooms.name: Mable Yolu
rooms.description:
You are on Mable road. To the north, the palace looms large, but the
entrance to the palace is to the east.  There is a sewer pipe exposed in
the side of the road.

rooms.name: Mable Yolu
rooms.description: You are on Mable road. To the north, the palace STILL looms big.

rooms.name: Mable Yolu
rooms.description:
You are on Mable road.  To the north, the palace looms majesticly on
the horizon.

rooms.name: Mable Yolu
rooms.description:
You are on Mable road.  To the southeast, you see the path leaving
Gerighelm.  Also, to the east, West-Street takes over.

rooms.name: Batý Yakasý Sokaðý
rooms.description: You are on the West-Street.  To the south, a path leading out of town begins.

rooms.name: Batý Yakasý Sokaðý
rooms.description:
You are on West-Street.  To the north, there is an intersection of
Merchant Way, West-street, and  Mable road.  And, to the east, Temple
Street wends.

rooms.name: Tapýnak Sokaðý
rooms.description:
You are on Temple Street.  To the south, there is some construction work
going on.

exits.description: You see the contruction crew building a new temple

rooms.name: Ýnþaat arazisi
rooms.description:
You are standing before a large construction site in which men are building a
new temple.
Who's it for?

rooms.name: Tapýnak Sokaðý
rooms.description: You are on Temple Street.  To the south is the Temple to Time.

rooms.name: Zaman Tapýnaðý
rooms.description:
You are standing inside the Temple to time. There are many clocks here, to say
the least.

rooms.name: Tapýnak Sokaðý
rooms.description: You are on Temple street. to the south, you see the cathedral.

exits.description:
You see an old, run down cathedral.  There are Gargoyles, vampires, and
others.  They seem to be moving....

rooms.name: Ölüm'ün Tapýnaðý
rooms.description:
You are standing inside the temple of Death. It's kinda scary in here, how
about running away hmm?

extra_descriptions.description: It is a coffin.  It's kinda scary, maybe you should just run away now, hmm?

rooms.name: Tapýnak Sokaðý
rooms.description:
You are standing on Temple street.  To the south a Temple is leaking.
Blood!

exits.description: You see the Temple to War!

rooms.name: Savaþa adanmýþ Tapýnak!
rooms.description:
There is blood dripping all over
the place.  Some of it has been captured, and is sent streaming into veritable
RIVERS of blood!  It's very artistic.  The altar contains: Blood, guts, a few
sacrificial offerings (corpses, soon to be corpses, whatever).

extra_descriptions.description: On the altar you see: babes, men, women, and, of course, ducklings.

rooms.name: Gerighelm'den uzanan patika
rooms.description: You are at the beginning of a path from Gerighelm.

rooms.name: Çöplük
rooms.description: You are at the Dump.

exits.description: You see the path from Gerighelm.

rooms.name: Çöplük
rooms.description: You are at the Dump.  Need I say more?

rooms.name: Tüccar Yolu
rooms.description:
You are at the beginning of Merchant way.  To the north, there is a shop
that proclaims itself 'Ye Olde Pet Shope'.  Those look like healthy, handsome
pets.

exits.description: You see the olde pet shope.

rooms.name: Köhne Hayvan Dükkaný
rooms.description:
You are standing inside the pet shop.  There are pets EVERYWHERE.
There are dogs, cats, kittens, puppy's, wolves, you name it.

rooms.name: Tüccar Yolu
rooms.description:
You are on the merchant way.  To the north, there is yet another shop.
This one is: Greghimles furniture store.

rooms.name: Greghimle'nin mobilya deposu
rooms.description:
You are inside Greghimles furniture store.  There are lamps, boxes, great
stuffed chairs, that sort of thing.

rooms.name: Tüccar Yolu
rooms.description:
You are on the Merchant way.  To the north, there is yet another store.
This one is:  Crazy Himshlick's portable fountains.  To the south, you see
the Barracks.

exits.description: You see Crazy Himshlick's portable fountains.

rooms.name: Çýlgýn Himshlick'in portatif çeþmeleri
rooms.description:
You are inside a ramshakle building, probably just thrown together for this
guys shop.  You see a sign advertising his 'low prices' and 'low interest
rates'....

rooms.name: Tüccar Yolu
rooms.description:
You are on the Merchant way.  To the north, there is another shop.
This one is:  Water bottles and beer.

exits.description: You see the Water bottles and beer.

rooms.name: Su þiþeleri ve Bira
rooms.description: You are inside a shop with a small bar.

rooms.name: Tüccar Yolu
rooms.description:
You are on the Merchant way.  To the north, there is yet another shop.
The sign out front reads: potions and wands.  To the east, there is a river,
but there is a bridge crossing it.

exits.description: You see the Potions and Wands.
You see the Bridge crossing the river.

rooms.name: Ýksir ve Deðnek dükkaný
rooms.description:
This shop is tended by an old witch.  There are boiling pots and cauldrons
all over.

rooms.name: Nehrin üzerindeki Köprü
rooms.description: You are on a bridge over the river.

rooms.name: Tüccar Yolu
rooms.description:
You are on Merchant way.  This part of Merchant way is much more crowded.
the vendors have taken to wandering the streets, selling their stock as they
go.

exits.description: You see the bridge over the river.

rooms.name: Kalabalýk pazar
rooms.description: You wonder if you are going to get out of this crowded market.....

rooms.name: Kalabalýk pazar
rooms.description:
You think that you can get away from the crowd!  To the north, there
is a long path the wends it's way into the distance.

rooms.name: Uzun patika
rooms.description:
You are on the long path.  To the south, you see the crowded market.
To the north, you see the path as peaceful as can be.

rooms.name: Uzun patika
rooms.description: You are on the long path. To the north and south is peace.

rooms.name: Kesiþme
rooms.description:
You are at a junction on the long path.  To the east, there is a bunch of
homes.

rooms.name: Kýrsal alan
rooms.description:
You are surrounded by people as they go about their errands from house to
house.

rooms.name: Kýrsal alan
rooms.description:
Up ahead, you see a pair of paths, that lead up to the front doors
of the houses.

exits.description: You see the path you came in on.

rooms.name: Patikalar
rooms.description:
The paths are under you feet now.  You can choose which house to go to
first.

exits.description: You see the path you came in on.

rooms.name: Ev
rooms.description: You are inside a house. the house continues to the east and west.

rooms.name: Ev
rooms.description: You are inside a house.  The house continues to the west, and east.

rooms.name: Yemek odasý
rooms.description: You are inside the dining room.

exits.description: You see the entrance to the house.

rooms.name: Salon
rooms.description: You are inside the sitting room.

exits.description: You see the entrance to the house.

rooms.name: Oturma odasý
rooms.description: You are inside the living room in the house.

exits.description: You see the entrance to the house.

rooms.name: Çizim odasý
rooms.description: You are inside the drawing room in the house.

exits.description: You see the entrance to the house.

rooms.name: Uzun patika
rooms.description: You are on the long path.  To the north, you see that the path ends.

exits.description: You see the end of the path.

rooms.name: Patikanýn sonu
rooms.description:
You are at the end of the long path, there is a sign here that says:
'under construction'  with an arrow pointing north.. To the north, you see
a building being coded.....

rooms.name: Kalabalýk pazar
rooms.description: Gods, this place is STUFFED with people!

rooms.name: Kalabalýk pazar
rooms.description:
You are in the crowded market.  To the east, there is a bridge over the
river.

rooms.name: Kalabalýk pazar
rooms.description:
You are in the crowded market.  The vendors here are getting on your
nerves. it's always 'Come see my fresh fish!' or 'my jewelry is THE BEST!'
etc....

rooms.name: Kalabalýk pazar
rooms.description:
You are in the crowded market.  How many people can there BE?! You ask
yourself.....

rooms.name: Kalabalýk pazar
rooms.description: You are in the crowded market.  There are too many people here..

rooms.name: Kalabalýk pazar
rooms.description: You are in the crowded market.  It's just so big...

rooms.name: Kalabalýk pazar
rooms.description: You are in the crowded market.  So many people, it's making you crazy!

rooms.name: Kalabalýk pazar
rooms.description: You are in the crowded market.  You start jabbering mindlessly....

rooms.name: Köprünün üzerinde
rooms.description:
You are on the bridge over the river.  The water here is beautiful.
One of the reasons it's beautiful, is because it's made of some kind of magic
mirror.  And, if thats not enough to convince you that it's beautiful, get
this-  There are women walking over it..... >:)

rooms.name: Pazar
rooms.description:
You are in a market, but it's much less crowded than the last one.
The vendors are still in open air setups, but at least they are
quieter about it...

rooms.name: Pazar
rooms.description:
Yes, you think, this arrangement is much better than the crowded one.
Vendors are quietly calling out their wares.

rooms.name: Pazar
rooms.description: You are in the market.  To the east, you can see the edge of the market.

rooms.name: Pazar
rooms.description: You are in the middle of the market.  The vendors are selling EVERYTHING!

rooms.name: Pazar
rooms.description:
You are at one of the corners of the market.  To the east, a path out of
town begins.

exits.description: You see the path out of town.

rooms.name: Pazar
rooms.description:
You are in the market.  There must be everything that man can sell or
buy being traded here...

rooms.name: Patikanýn üstünde
rooms.description:
The path takes you near a large town.  On the west, there is a
small hole in the wall of the market, that you might crawl through.There is
a sign here.

extra_descriptions.description:
The sign reads:

                                Welcome to the fine city of
                                Gerighelm.
                                There are many fine adventures
                                for all of you who go here,
                                So give it a try!

rooms.name: Patika
rooms.description:
The path travels by a market. To the west you see it, full of food,
clothing, and jewelry! You have another chance to go to the
town to the north, and to the south.

rooms.name: Patikanýn üstünde
rooms.description:
The path leads you to a small gate to a large town.  The gate is unguarded
and there is a sign here.

extra_descriptions.description:
The sign reads:
                                Welcome travelers!
                        This is the great city of Gerighelm.
                Where many adventurers lost their lives, and gained fame
                                        and fortune.

rooms.name: Pazar
rooms.description:
You are in the market.  To the east there is an old gate, but it's not
guarded.  These vendors, you just can't get over it-- they buy ANYTHING.
If you can find the right one...

exits.description: You see the path out of town.

rooms.name: Pazar
rooms.description:
You are in the market.  To the east, you catch a faint glimmering of what
may be a path, but you are not sure.  You get back to marvelling over these
vendors...

rooms.name: Pazar
rooms.description: You are in the market.  Gods, these vendors are cool!

rooms.name: Pazar
rooms.description: You are in the market.  To you, this is the niftiest place to be,

rooms.name: Pazar
rooms.description: You are in the market.  To the south and west, the market turns into a wall.

rooms.name: Pazar
rooms.description:
You are in the market.  To the west, you can see the river flowing into
the underground sewers system.

rooms.name: Þövalyelerin Kalesi'ne Giriþ
rooms.description:
You are standing beside the entrance to the Knights' castle.
To the west, the palace stretches on, covered with silks, furs, and gold.
To the south there is mable road

extra_descriptions.description: The silks are very fine, they must have been purchased from China or Japan.
The furs are from beasts like:  bears, foxes, wolves, jabberwockies. etc.
What do you expect? It's GOLD!

rooms.name: Saray
rooms.description: You are inside the palace.  It's a very fine place to be you realize.

exits.description: You see the entrance to the palace.

rooms.name: Sarayýn Ýçi
rooms.description:
You are inside the palace of Gerighelm.  To the north, you see a room
that is guarded by an old man.  To the east and west, the palace continues
it's splendor.

exits.description: You see the room guarded by the old man.

rooms.name: Hazine odasý
rooms.description:
You are standing just outside the treasury.  there is a huge iron door
to the east.  The old man says 'STOP'. He says 'You cannot enter here.'  'Go.'

exits.description: You see the huge iron door.

rooms.name: Hazine odasýnýn içi
rooms.description:
You see the final defenses of the Treasury.  Three bugbears!!!
Aside from you certain doom, you see lots of gold, silver, and other such
valuables...

exits.description: You see the huge iron door

rooms.name: Sarayýn içi
rooms.description:
You are inside the palace of Gerighelm.  here, the palace opens into
a large garden.  Complete with birds, chipmunks, and bugs OUCH <stupid fly>

rooms.name: Bahçe
rooms.description:
You are in the palace garden.  You hope that the Gardener won't catch
you wandering about like this..

rooms.name: Bahçe
rooms.description:
Here the garden is blocked by a wall to the north, west, and south.
But the flowers are still as pretty though.

rooms.name: Bahçenin sonu
rooms.description:
You are at the and of the garden.  To the north there is a GRAND hall.
I wonder whats at the end of it?.

rooms.name: Büyük koridor
rooms.description:
You are in the great hall of the palace of Gerighelm. To the north, you
see what may be a throne room. To the east however, there seems to be an altar.
And to the west, there is some servants quarters.

rooms.name: Mimber
rooms.description: What luck! It's the altar to your very own God! Better pray here and now!

rooms.name: Hizmetçilerin Bölmeleri
rooms.description:
These are the servants quarters.  To the south, there are more of them.
The quarters themselves are much like quarters indeed.  there are 4 beds to
a room. and 4 boxes under each bed.  The boxes are locked, and pickproof,
so don't be getting any ideas...

rooms.name: Hizmetçilerin Bölmeleri
rooms.description:
You are in some servants quarters.  They are much like the last one you
saw, except there are only 3 beds and boxes.

rooms.name: Taht Odasý
rooms.description:
This is it! The Throne Room!  The Duke and Duchess are sitting in their
respective thrones, which are carved out of the finest ebony and ivory.
The furs, gold, and silks are VERY VERY VERY resplendent here.  There is a
staircase that leads upward, and a staircase that leads down.

rooms.name: Koridor
rooms.description:
You are in a hall way that leads to two bedrooms.  The door to the north
has some gold words on it that say 'Dukes room' and the words on the south
door say 'Duchesses room'.  This is all so formal, you think.

exits.description: You see the door to the dukes room.
You see the door to the duchesses room.

rooms.name: Düþes'in odasý
rooms.description:
This is the Duchesses room.  She must come here when she and her husband
have a spat.  You know this because the room is relatively dusty compared
with all the other rooms here.

exits.description: You see the door of this room.

rooms.name: Dük'ün odasý
rooms.description:
This room is well used to say the least.  I'd say more, but it's not the
kinda thing to transmit over phone lines.  But I can tell you this:
The Duke and his wife have, shall we say, _interesting_ habits >:)

exits.description: You see the door to this room.

rooms.name: Bira mahzeni
rooms.description:
Yes, I know you were expecting a wine cellar, and one farther from the
Throne room, but the Duke designed it himself, and..-Well anyway:
The room is your standard cellar, there are many empty racks here, and only
2 bottle left. Hmmm...

rooms.name: Barakalar
rooms.description: You are in the barracks.  There are guards all around you, coming and going.

rooms.name: Kurban Odasý
rooms.description: Blood, blood, blood, guts, flesh, corpses....
